The elementary brand is unique: technica: Merek unik elementary: milik elementary LLC., perusahaan yang memandu dan mendukung development produk elementary. Namun, kami mempunyai komunitas yang besar dan kami tidak akan terlalu sombong dengan persyaratan hukum dan teknisnya. Dengan demikian, kamu telah menulis beberapa panduan agar lebih mudah dimengerti ketika produk elementary digunakan.
Name: Nama
The word \"elementary\" refers to and is: Kata "elementary" mengacu dan merupakan merek dagang dari elementary LLC. elementary ditulis menggunakan huruf kecil, meskipun tertulis pada awal kalimat seperti ini. Itu selalu digunakan bersama dengan nama produk (yaitu "elementary OS") untuk merujuk pada spesifik produk dari elementary.
elementary owns two marks: the \"element: elementary memiliki dua tanda: tipe logo "elementary" dan simbol logo "e". Keduanya dianggap merek dagang dan mewakili perusahaan elementary dan produk-produknya.
Do not stretch, skew, rotate, flip, or o: Jangan direnggangkan, dicondongkan, diputar, dibalik, atau mengubah tanda.
Do not use the marks on an overly-busy b: Jangan menggunakan tanda di latar belakang yang memiliki banyak warna; menggunakan warna solid lebih baik.
The marks should always be monochromatic: The marks should always be monochromatic; typically white if on a dark background, or black if on a light background.
The logotype is to be used when space al: The logotype is to be used when space allows to refer to elementary the company. It can be used before a product name to refer to a specific product of elementary.
The logotype should always be used under: The logotype should always be used under the following guidelines:
Do not attempt to recreate the logotype. It is a meticulously-designed brand mark, not simply "elementary" written in a specific font.
Do not use the logotype at small sizes;: Do not use the logotype at small sizes; if it is not clear, use the logomark instead.
The \"e\" logomark is to be used to refe: The "e" logomark is to be used to refer to elementary the company when space is constrained or a square ratio is required.
elementary employs the use of color comb: elementary employs the use of color combined with our name and marks to establish our brand. We use the following palette:
For web and print, we use Raleway for he: For web and print, we use Raleway for headings and Open Sans for body copy. For code blocks, we use Roboto Mono.
We encourage third party developers crea: We encourage third party developers creating products for elementary OS to adopt certain elements of the elementary brand to achieve consistency:
However, to avoid user confusion, we do: However, to avoid user confusion, we do restrict the usage of the elementary name and marks:
You are encouraged to say that your app: You are encouraged to say that your app or service is designed for elementary OS, but please don't use the elementary name or marks as part of the name of your company, application, product, service, or in any logo you create.
Only use the elementary name or marks to: Only use the elementary name or marks to refer to elementary LLC. or its products (i.e. elementary OS).
We do not typically allow our branding (: We do not typically allow our branding (including our name or brand marks) to be used on third-party merchandise.
For further information regarding the us: For further information regarding the use of the elementary name, branding, and trademarks, please email brand@elementary.io.
